00020 typedef struct
00021 {
00022     BYTE *pbWaveData;               // pointer into wave resource (for restore)
00023     DWORD cbWaveSize;               // size of wave data (for restore)
00024     int iAlloc;                     // number of buffers.
00025     int iCurrent;                   // current buffer
00026     IDirectSoundBuffer* Buffers[1]; // list of buffers
00027 
00028 } SNDOBJ, *HSNDOBJ;
00029

00033 static const char c_szWAV[] = "WAVE";

00035 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00036 //
00037 // DSLoadSoundBuffer
00038 //
00039 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00040 
00041 IDirectSoundBuffer *DSLoadSoundBuffer(IDirectSound *pDS, LPCTSTR lpName)
00042 {
00043     IDirectSoundBuffer *pDSB = NULL;
00044     DSBUFFERDESC dsBD = {0};
00045     BYTE *pbWaveData;
00046 
00047     if (DSGetWaveResource(NULL, lpName, &dsBD.lpwfxFormat, &pbWaveData, &dsBD.dwBufferBytes))
00048     {
00049         dsBD.dwSize = sizeof(dsBD);
00050         dsBD.dwFlags = DSBCAPS_STATIC | DSBCAPS_CTRLDEFAULT; // | DSBCAPS_GETCURRENTPOSITION2;
00051 
00052         if (SUCCEEDED(IDirectSound_CreateSoundBuffer(pDS, &dsBD, &pDSB, NULL)))
00053         {
00054             if (!DSFillSoundBuffer(pDSB, pbWaveData, dsBD.dwBufferBytes))
00055             {
00056                 IDirectSoundBuffer_Release(pDSB);
00057                 pDSB = NULL;
00058             }
00059         }
00060         else
00061         {
00062             pDSB = NULL;
00063         }
00064     }
00065 
00066     return pDSB;
00067 }
00068 
00069 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00070 //
00071 // DSReloadSoundBuffer
00072 //
00073 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00074 
00075 BOOL DSReloadSoundBuffer(IDirectSoundBuffer *pDSB, LPCTSTR lpName)
00076 {
00077     BOOL result=FALSE;
00078     BYTE *pbWaveData;
00079     DWORD cbWaveSize;
00080 
00081     if (DSGetWaveResource(NULL, lpName, NULL, &pbWaveData, &cbWaveSize))
00082     {
00083         if (SUCCEEDED(IDirectSoundBuffer_Restore(pDSB)) &&
00084             DSFillSoundBuffer(pDSB, pbWaveData, cbWaveSize))
00085         {
00086             result = TRUE;
00087         }
00088     }
00089 
00090     return result;
00091 }

00093 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00094 //
00095 // DSGetWaveResource
00096 //
00097 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00098 
00099 BOOL DSGetWaveResource(HMODULE hModule, LPCTSTR lpName,
00100     WAVEFORMATEX **ppWaveHeader, BYTE **ppbWaveData, DWORD *pcbWaveSize)
00101 {
00102     HRSRC hResInfo;
00103     HGLOBAL hResData;
00104     void *pvRes;
00105 
00106     if (((hResInfo = FindResource(hModule, lpName, c_szWAV)) != NULL) &&
00107         ((hResData = LoadResource(hModule, hResInfo)) != NULL) &&
00108         ((pvRes = LockResource(hResData)) != NULL) &&
00109         DSParseWaveResource(pvRes, ppWaveHeader, ppbWaveData, pcbWaveSize))
00110     {
00111         return TRUE;
00112     }
00113 
00114     return FALSE;
00115 }

00117 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00118 // SndObj fns
00119 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00120 
00121 SNDOBJ *SndObjCreate(IDirectSound *pDS, LPCTSTR lpName, int iConcurrent)
00122 {
00123     SNDOBJ *pSO = NULL;
00124     LPWAVEFORMATEX pWaveHeader;
00125     BYTE *pbData;
00126     UINT cbData;
00127 
00128     if (DSGetWaveResource(NULL, lpName, &pWaveHeader, &pbData, (DWORD *)&cbData))
00129     {
00130         if (iConcurrent < 1)
00131             iConcurrent = 1;
00132 
00133         if ((pSO = (SNDOBJ *)LocalAlloc(LPTR, sizeof(SNDOBJ) +
00134             (iConcurrent-1) * sizeof(IDirectSoundBuffer *))) != NULL)
00135         {
00136             int i;
00137 
00138             pSO->iAlloc = iConcurrent;
00139             pSO->pbWaveData = pbData;
00140             pSO->cbWaveSize = cbData;
00141             pSO->Buffers[0] = DSLoadSoundBuffer(pDS, lpName);
00142 
00143             for (i=1; i<pSO->iAlloc; i++)
00144             {
00145                 if (FAILED(IDirectSound_DuplicateSoundBuffer(pDS,
00146                     pSO->Buffers[0], &pSO->Buffers[i])))
00147                 {
00148                     pSO->Buffers[i] = DSLoadSoundBuffer(pDS, lpName);
00149                     if (!pSO->Buffers[i]) {
00150                         SndObjDestroy(pSO);
00151                         pSO = NULL;
00152                         break;
00153                     }
00154                 }
00155             }
00156         }
00157     }
00158 
00159     return pSO;
00160 }
00161 
00162 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00163 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00164 
00165 void SndObjDestroy(SNDOBJ *pSO)
00166 {
00167     if (pSO)
00168     {
00169         int i;
00170 
00171         for (i=0; i<pSO->iAlloc; i++)
00172         {
00173             if (pSO->Buffers[i])
00174             {
00175                 IDirectSoundBuffer_Release(pSO->Buffers[i]);
00176                 pSO->Buffers[i] = NULL;
00177             }
00178         }
00179         LocalFree((HANDLE)pSO);
00180     }
00181 }

00183 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00184 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00185 
00186 IDirectSoundBuffer *SndObjGetFreeBuffer(SNDOBJ *pSO)
00187 {
00188     IDirectSoundBuffer *pDSB;
00189 
00190     if (pSO == NULL)
00191         return NULL;
00192 
00193     if (pDSB = pSO->Buffers[pSO->iCurrent])
00194     {
00195         HRESULT hres;
00196         DWORD dwStatus;
00197 
00198         hres = IDirectSoundBuffer_GetStatus(pDSB, &dwStatus);
00199 
00200         if (FAILED(hres))
00201             dwStatus = 0;
00202 
00203         if ((dwStatus & DSBSTATUS_PLAYING) == DSBSTATUS_PLAYING)
00204         {
00205             if (pSO->iAlloc > 1)
00206             {
00207                 if (++pSO->iCurrent >= pSO->iAlloc)
00208                     pSO->iCurrent = 0;
00209 
00210                 pDSB = pSO->Buffers[pSO->iCurrent];
00211                 hres = IDirectSoundBuffer_GetStatus(pDSB, &dwStatus);
00212 
00213                 if (SUCCEEDED(hres) && (dwStatus & DSBSTATUS_PLAYING) == DSBSTATUS_PLAYING)
00214                 {
00215                     IDirectSoundBuffer_Stop(pDSB);
00216                     IDirectSoundBuffer_SetCurrentPosition(pDSB, 0);
00217                 }
00218             }
00219             else
00220             {
00221                 pDSB = NULL;
00222             }
00223         }
00224 
00225         if (pDSB && (dwStatus & DSBSTATUS_BUFFERLOST))
00226         {
00227             if (FAILED(IDirectSoundBuffer_Restore(pDSB)) ||
00228                 !DSFillSoundBuffer(pDSB, pSO->pbWaveData, pSO->cbWaveSize))
00229             {
00230                 pDSB = NULL;
00231             }
00232         }
00233     }
00234 
00235     return pDSB;
00236 }

00238 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00239 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00240 
00241 BOOL SndObjPlay(SNDOBJ *pSO, DWORD dwPlayFlags)
00242 {
00243     BOOL result = FALSE;
00244 
00245     if (pSO == NULL)
00246         return FALSE;
00247 
00248     if ((!(dwPlayFlags & DSBPLAY_LOOPING) || (pSO->iAlloc == 1)))
00249     {
00250         IDirectSoundBuffer *pDSB = SndObjGetFreeBuffer(pSO);
00251         if (pDSB != NULL) {
00252             result = SUCCEEDED(IDirectSoundBuffer_Play(pDSB, 0, 0, dwPlayFlags));
00253         }
00254     }
00255 
00256     return result;
00257 }
00258 
00259 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00260 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00261 
00262 BOOL SndObjStop(SNDOBJ *pSO)
00263 {
00264     int i;
00265 
00266     if (pSO == NULL)
00267         return FALSE;
00268 
00269     for (i=0; i<pSO->iAlloc; i++)
00270     {
00271         IDirectSoundBuffer_Stop(pSO->Buffers[i]);
00272         IDirectSoundBuffer_SetCurrentPosition(pSO->Buffers[i], 0);
00273     }
00274 
00275     return TRUE;
00276 }

00278 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00279 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00280 
00281 BOOL DSFillSoundBuffer(IDirectSoundBuffer *pDSB, BYTE *pbWaveData, DWORD cbWaveSize)
00282 {
00283     if (pDSB && pbWaveData && cbWaveSize)
00284     {
00285         LPVOID pMem1, pMem2;
00286         DWORD dwSize1, dwSize2;
00287 
00288         if (SUCCEEDED(IDirectSoundBuffer_Lock(pDSB, 0, cbWaveSize,
00289             &pMem1, &dwSize1, &pMem2, &dwSize2, 0)))
00290         {
00291             CopyMemory(pMem1, pbWaveData, dwSize1);
00292 
00293             if ( 0 != dwSize2 )
00294                 CopyMemory(pMem2, pbWaveData+dwSize1, dwSize2);
00295 
00296             IDirectSoundBuffer_Unlock(pDSB, pMem1, dwSize1, pMem2, dwSize2);
00297             return TRUE;
00298         }
00299     }
00300 
00301     return FALSE;
00302 }
00303 
00304 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00305 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00306 
00307 BOOL DSParseWaveResource(void *pvRes, WAVEFORMATEX **ppWaveHeader, BYTE **ppbWaveData,DWORD *pcbWaveSize)
00308 {
00309     DWORD *pdw;
00310     DWORD *pdwEnd;
00311     DWORD dwRiff;
00312     DWORD dwType;
00313     DWORD dwLength;
00314 
00315     if (ppWaveHeader)
00316         *ppWaveHeader = NULL;
00317 
00318     if (ppbWaveData)
00319         *ppbWaveData = NULL;
00320 
00321     if (pcbWaveSize)
00322         *pcbWaveSize = 0;
00323 
00324     pdw = (DWORD *)pvRes;
00325     dwRiff = *pdw++;
00326     dwLength = *pdw++;
00327     dwType = *pdw++;
00328 
00329     if (dwRiff != mmioFOURCC('R', 'I', 'F', 'F'))
00330         goto exit;      // not even RIFF
00331 
00332     if (dwType != mmioFOURCC('W', 'A', 'V', 'E'))
00333         goto exit;      // not a WAV
00334 
00335     pdwEnd = (DWORD *)((BYTE *)pdw + dwLength-4);
00336 
00337     while (pdw < pdwEnd)
00338     {
00339         dwType = *pdw++;
00340         dwLength = *pdw++;
00341 
00342         switch (dwType)
00343         {
00344         case mmioFOURCC('f', 'm', 't', ' '):
00345             if (ppWaveHeader && !*ppWaveHeader)
00346             {
00347                 if (dwLength < sizeof(WAVEFORMAT))
00348                     goto exit;      // not a WAV
00349 
00350                 *ppWaveHeader = (WAVEFORMATEX *)pdw;
00351 
00352                 if ((!ppbWaveData || *ppbWaveData) &&
00353                     (!pcbWaveSize || *pcbWaveSize))
00354                 {
00355                     return TRUE;
00356                 }
00357             }
00358             break;
00359 
00360         case mmioFOURCC('d', 'a', 't', 'a'):
00361             if ((ppbWaveData && !*ppbWaveData) ||
00362                 (pcbWaveSize && !*pcbWaveSize))
00363             {
00364                 if (ppbWaveData)
00365                     *ppbWaveData = (LPBYTE)pdw;
00366 
00367                 if (pcbWaveSize)
00368                     *pcbWaveSize = dwLength;
00369 
00370                 if (!ppWaveHeader || *ppWaveHeader)
00371                     return TRUE;
00372             }
00373             break;
00374         }
00375 
00376         pdw = (DWORD *)((BYTE *)pdw + ((dwLength+1)&~1));
00377     }
00378 
00379 exit:
00380     return FALSE;
00381 }
